metadata.title: Azure AI Fundamentals
metadata.subtitle: Your Gateway to the AI Revolution
metadata.description: AI isn't science fiction anymore - it's the competitive advantage that separates industry leaders from everyone else. This course gives you the knowledge to understand, evaluate, and leverage AI technologies that are transforming every business on the planet.
prerequisites: An open mind and curiosity about technology
Zero AI experience required - we start from the very beginning

highlights: Understand the AI technologies disrupting every industry
Learn to evaluate and implement AI solutions
Master the fundamentals that AI experts build upon
Position yourself for the highest-paying tech roles

overview.summary: Companies are racing to adopt AI, but most people don't even understand what it can do. This course changes that. You'll learn the fundamental concepts that power everything from ChatGPT to self-driving cars, and you'll understand how Azure AI services can be applied to real business problems. By the end, you'll speak the language of AI fluently and understand how to leverage these technologies to create competitive advantages.
objectives: Demystify AI and understand what it can (and can't) do for your business
Master the core concepts behind machine learning and neural networks
Explore Azure's AI toolkit and when to use each service
Learn to identify AI opportunities in your current role
Understand ethical AI practices and responsible implementation
Build a foundation for advanced AI certifications and roles
overview.targetAudience: This course is for anyone who wants to understand the AI revolution happening right now. Whether you're a business leader trying to navigate AI adoption, a professional looking to future-proof your career, or someone who wants to understand the technology that's reshaping our world - if you want to be part of the AI conversation rather than just watching it happen, this course will give you the knowledge and confidence to participate meaningfully.

faq.question: Do I need programming experience?
faq.answer: No, this course is designed for beginners and doesn't require programming experience. However, basic computer skills are helpful.

faq.question: What Azure services will I learn about?
faq.answer: You'll learn about Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Machine Learning, Azure Bot Service, Azure Computer Vision, and Azure Language services.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: This is a foundational course that covers concepts and services at a high level. It's suitable for both technical and non-technical audiences.

faq.question: Will I be able to build AI applications after this course?
faq.answer: You'll understand the fundamentals and be able to use Azure AI services, but for building complex AI applications, you may want to take more advanced courses like Azure AI Engineer Associate.
